lines: rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo
lha dbang dbang phyug 'phrog byed gser gyi mngal
klu dbang dbang bsgyur mkha' lding grub pa'i gtso
nye dbang dbang po'i dgra sogs lus can gyis
thub dbang dbang phyug brgyad ldan gus pas mchod
rab 'byams rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen pa'i gter
li khri'i mdog can nyi 'od 'khyug pa'i sku
mtshan dpe'i dpal ldan rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes
zhi zhing 'dzum ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs la 'dud
rgyal ba'i gsung rab gting zab yangs pa'i mtshor
rten 'byung zab mo'i phung sgra sgrogs mdzad cing
sems kyi gdengs ka mkhyen brtse'i nor bus spras
klu sgrub klu yi dbang po'i zhabs la 'dud
shes bya'i mkha' la rigs pa'i 'od dkar
can| |mkhas mang rgyu skar dbus na rab mdzes shing
klu sgru gsung rab kun nga'i gnyen gcig pu
dpal ldan zla ba grags pa'i zhabs la 'dud
'jam dbyangs gsung gi nyi 'od dang 'grogs pas
blo gros 'dab bzang grags pa'i dri bsung can
gsung gi sbrang rtsis blo gsal bung ba'i tshogs
tshim mdzad 'jam dpal snying po'i zhabs la 'dud
rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos tshul ji snyed kun
rgyal tshab dam pa dar ma'i zhabs la 'dud
zab rgyas rtogs pa'i lus stobs mi dman zhing
rigs pa'i nga ros gsum rab bsgrags pas
phyir rgol glang po'i spobs pa 'phrog byed pa
'jigs med shes rab seng ge'i zhabs la 'dud
mtha' bral dbu ma chen po'i bstan bcos la
'jug pa'i dgongs pa rab tu gsal ba'i don
'bad pa chung ngus bde blag rtogs pa'i phyir
rab gsal me long bdag gis brtsam par bya
gang zag rgyun dang phung bo dang
de bzhin rkyen dang rdul dag dang
gtso bo dbang phyug byed po rnams
sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do
phyi rol snang ba yod med de
sems ni sna tshogs rnams su snang
lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra ba
sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do
ji ltar nad pa nad pa la
sman pa sman ni gtong ba ltar
de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la
sems tsam du yang rab tu gsungs
ji lar yan lag tshogs rnams la
brten nas shing rtar brjod pa ltar
de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas
kun rdzob sems can zhes bya'o
don gyi gzugs kun ji bzhin rab gsal zhing
blo yi bzhin legs gang dag mgu byed pa'i
rab gsal me long 'di ni kho bos byas
dge ba 'di yis mtha' yas lus can kun
blo mig phyogs lhung dri mas ma slang cing
rigs dang mi rigs tshul bzhin 'byed pa la
myur du thams cad gzigs pa thob par shog
phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon
rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la
spyod phyir bkra shis lhun grub chos grwa cher
chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel
